Text: I use this on my hair and this (along with another moisturizer/oil) has made it feel so soft! And it has so many used I might use it when I cook but I'm not quite there yet. I'm not sure if the cost is right or not but I use a lot of the oil and I haven't even used 1/8th of the 1st tub yet. I'm very happy with it and will buy this & this brand again.
